column5: Unit A. High ceilings throughout, huge closets, dining table, and bar with bar stools. This 3 bedroom, 2 bath 2 car garage home is fully furnished with everything you would expect in a high end vacation rental. Stained concrete floors with carpet in the master bedroom, granite in the kitchen. Master bath has a shower and 2nd bath has shower/jetted tub. Office with built in desk. High ceilings throughout, huge closets, dining table, and bar with bar stools. Sleeps up to 9 with air mattress.
column8: 3 Bed 2 Bath 2 Car Garage and Fully Furnished
